hero.name: Ismail Hossain
hero.title: Flutter & Kotlin Developer | Mobile App Enthusiast
hero.description: I am a passionate Mobile Application Developer based in Tangail, Bangladesh. I specialize in building high-quality, user-friendly mobile applications using Flutter and Kotlin.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I’m currently working as a Junior Flutter Developer at Impala Intech Limited. I’m currently learning Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP) and Rust. Winner of the National Skills Competition 2025 (Mobile App Development). Ask me about Flutter, Android Development, and App Optimization.

projects.title: Al Quran Tafsir & Audio
projects.description: A comprehensive Islamic app serving thousands of users. Features 69 Language Translations, Tafsir in 6 languages, 40+ Reciters, Prayer Times.

projects.title: Rust Book App
projects.description: An educational app for learning the Rust programming language. Features Rust Book translation in 18 languages, Offline access.

projects.title: ODMS (Outbound Delivery Management System)
projects.description: Enterprise solution for Radiant Pharmaceuticals. Used by 3k+ delivery employees for real-time tracking and activity management.

achievements.title: National Skills Competition 2025
achievements.description: Winner (Mobile App Development) - Organized by NSDA.

achievements.title: Community Leader
achievements.description: Led programming workshops at TPI Programming Club.

achievements.title: Mentor
achievements.description: Guiding teams in Flutter app development.
